title: No mastery 6 token after getting S grade

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
So after I finished playing a game with Xerath and got an S grade I noticed that I didnt get a mastery token for level 6
I put an image above for proof

replies.body: What game mode were you playing when you got the S grade with Xerath? Mastery tokens are only available when playing normal or ranked Summoner's Rift matches. You will not be able to earn them if you were playing ARAM, Twisted Treeline, or any of the rotating game modes.
That must be it because I was playing twisted treeline 3v3. Thanks for making this clear for me

I took a look into this and it seems like you may have earned the S grade while playing 3v3 Twisted Treeline. If this is correct, then *Zombiemaster* made a great analysis here. While you can earn hextech chests in modes outside of SR, you can only earn champion mastery tokens inside of an SR match. For complete info, check out our [Champion Mastery Guide. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Same thing happened to me this morning.  I got an S- on Miss Fortune and NO Mastery 7 token.  What gives??
An S- will not earn you a mastery level 7 token. If you want a mastery level 7 token, you need to get an S or S+.
